verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Jesus, I long,
I long to be winning
Men who are lost,
and constantly sinning;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
O may this hour
be one of beginning
The story of pardon to tell.

verse.name: v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
O that Thy love were
by all adored,
And welcomed at any cost.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Though there are dangers
untold and stern
Confronting me in the way,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Willingly still would I go,
nor turn, but trust
Thee for grace each day.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
How shall this passion
for souls be mine?
Lord, make

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Thou the answer clear;
Help me to throw
out the old Life-Line
To those who are struggling near.
